Pre-Game Insights: Orlando Magic have won each of their last 28 games at Kia Center against teams that held a losing record.
Utah Jazz have lost each of their last eight road games against opponents who are on the first leg of a back-to-back.
Orlando Magic have covered the spread in nine of their last 10 games at Kia Center following a win.
Utah Jazz have failed to cover the spread in five of their last six games as underdogs against opponents who are on the first leg of a back-to-back.
Orlando Magic have lost each of their last two games as favorites following a win.
Utah Jazz have won each of their last five night games against the Magic following a road win.
Utah Jazz have covered the spread in each of their last five night games against the Magic following a road win.
Orlando Magic have failed to cover the spread in six of their last seven games as home favorites against Northwest Division opponents.
Miscellaneous Highlights: John Collins ranks 3rd amongst qualified Centers for 3P% (43.8%) this season.
Collin Sexton ranks 12th amongst qualified players for FT% (89.6%) this season.
The Magic rank 1st in the league for opponent offensive rebounds per game this season (8.4).
The Magic rank 30th in the league for three-point percentage this season (31.0%).
The Jazz rank 30th in the league for opponent blocks per game this season (6.4).
The Jazz rank 30th in the league for turnovers per game this season (18.3).
